details: This script is running within the SLURM workload manager. It requests one task with one CPU and 64GB of memory. It specifies the GPU type (v100) and account for running the job. Additionally, it uses modules to load TensorFlow and activates a virtual environment. The script performs multiple experiments by training and testing a multi-label CNN model using various parameters, including epochs, maximum words, learning rate, word vectors, and input data.
